translation.en: We should've done this ourselves.
We know the king's palace better than your patsy does.
translation.ko: 왕의 궁전은 네 졸개보다 우리가 더 잘 알잖아

translation.en: Teela hasn't failed us yet.
She'll find what we seek.
With that sword, the Power of Grayskull
translation.ko: 그 검만 있으면 그레이스컬의 권능은 곧 우리 것이 돼

translation.en: will soon be ours.
translation.ko: 그레이스컬의 권능은 곧 우리 것이 돼

translation.en: How's the nation of Eternos this evening?
Quiet as a shadow, King Randor.
Never trust shadows, General.
You catch that game of modulok?
No, modulok's too complicated.
Running on your hands and passing with your feet?
[sucks teeth] No, thank you.
I'll take it from here, Soldier.
Of course, General Dolos.
I'll take it from here, Soldier.
Evelyn better pay me this time.
Oh, come on!
'Word witch didn't say there'd be this many to choose from.
translation.ko: 주술 마녀는 왜 콕 집어 어떤 거라고 말 안 해줬지?

translation.en: -Okay. -[knuckles crack]
Which one of you is gonna give me that trademark Teela Grayskull tingle?
translation.ko: 너희들 중 어떤 게 나한테 찌릿한 신호를 보내주는지 보자

translation.en: I've been contracted to go through all this trouble to steal a--
translation.ko: 그 고생해 가며 여기 왔는데 고작 훔치라는 게 이…

translation.en: [woman's voice echoing] Sword, Eternia, Grayskull, secrets, Eternia, Power,
Masters of the Universe, Masters of the Universe.
That was way more than a tingle.
[soldier] Drop the sword!
I'll just put it right... here.
Did she just continue to steal?
Sorry. [chuckles] I just needed my hands free to do... this.
translation.ko: 미안, 두 손이 자유로워야 이걸 할 수 있거든

translation.en: Oh, no!
How will we ever grab our swords with our other hands?
translation.ko: 남은 다른 손으로 어떻게 검을 잡지?

translation.en: Oh, sorry. My thumb stuck.
Able to do... this!
Oh, yeah, much better.
[solider] Somebody stop her!
-You! Halt! -[blasters firing] Get her now!
Go! Go! Get her!
Ah-ha-ha, one of my legs fell asleep, sorry.
Must you have brought your apprentice along?
[soldier] You! Halt!
Duncan didn't bring the Royal Guard to the extraction point.
translation.ko: 덩컨은 왕실 근위대를 탈출 지점으로 데려오진 않았지

translation.en: Just sayin'.
Incoming!
What an unfortunate turn of events...
for them.
No! They're just doing their jobs!
translation.ko: 안 돼요! 자기 일 하는 거잖아요

translation.en: Give me the sword, Hand Witch.
[woman's voice echoing] That sword does not belong to her.
translation.ko: 그 검은 그 여자 게 아냐

translation.en: Start the engine, kid. This is a bust.
We're on our way to you.
The sword is right there.
Our key to universal unstoppable power is right there!
translation.ko: 우주를 지배할 막강한 힘의 열쇠가 바로 저기 있다고!

translation.en: We don't gotta find the sword again, just the girl.
translation.ko: 이제는 검이 아니라 그 여자애를 찾으면 돼

translation.en: Let's move.
[woman's voice echoing] Bring the sword to the champion.
What champion?
I have the Power!
[singer] ♪ The Power is ours ♪ ♪ It's in our so-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-oul ♪
♪ The Power is ours ♪ ♪ It's in our so-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-o-oul ♪
♪ The Power is ours ♪
♪ Hey, we'll find our purpose ♪
♪ 'Cause we know we're worth it ♪
♪ And we'll be remembered ♪
♪ We are the defenders, defenders ♪
-♪ Oh ♪ -♪ We fight for the win ♪
♪ We fight till the end ♪
-♪ We fight for the win ♪ -♪ The Power is ours ♪
translation.ko: 마지막까지 - 끝까지 싸워 - 검의 힘이여, 솟아라

translation.en: ♪ It's in our soul ♪
Hang in there, Kitty. I've got you.
Just crawl onto my shoulders and we can both go home.
translation.ko: 내 어깨로 기어 올라와 같이 집에 가자

translation.en: No.
What do you mean, no?
I don't want us to fall.
We won't fall.
We won't fall...
...if you get on my shoulders right now.
Did you, like, eat rocks today?
I thought they were potatoes.
[man] Did they taste like potatoes?
[Kitty] I've never had a potato before.
-[grunts] -How am I supposed to know?
You jump the rest of the way. What about you?
I'll be fine.
Dragonfly.
-No. -Dragonfly.
No, don't do it. Focus.
Dragonfly!
[woman] Adam, are you two done yet?
Or do you wanna hang out some more?
translation.ko: 아니면 좀 더 같이 놀 거야?

translation.en: How long have you been there?
Long enough to work on that joke.
Thought it might defuse the tension.
Way to take my mind off of imminent death, Krass.
translation.ko: 임박한 죽음을 잊게 해주는 기발한 방법이네

translation.en: Thanks.
What are best friends for?
You weren't on tracker duty today.
What are you doing out here? Cringer's missing,
and this part of the woods has the best snacks for grabbing,
translation.ko: 여기가 숲에서 가장 맛있는 간식이 있는 곳이거든

translation.en: so I figured why not start looking for him here?
Wait, did you just say Cringer was missing?
Kitty, did you come out here looking for your uncle?
translation.ko: 키티, 너 혹시 삼촌 찾으러 온 거야?

translation.en: Maybe.
He said he wanted to go hunting again.
Puh! He can't hunt without claws.
Try telling him that.
[poacher bot 1] Contain. Shut.
-[snarls] -Push.
Release me, or incur the wrath of my tribe,
translation.ko: 날 안 풀어주면 내 부족이 가만 안 둘 거다 이 비스토포이드 불한당들아!

translation.en: you Beastopoid brutes.
translation.ko: 내 부족이 가만 안 둘 거다 이 비스토포이드 불한당들아!

translation.en: [poacher bot 1] Quarry talks like it is people.
[poacher bot 2] Quarry talks like we are people.
Don't you poachers want more from life than caging and hurting animals?
translation.ko: 너희 밀렵꾼들은 동물을 사냥하고 가두는 것밖에 못 해?

translation.en: Why not rise up against your keeper?
Try living for yourselves.
[poacher bot 1] Initiate capture.
An uprising would displease our keeper.
Query for quarry: what happened to you
translation.ko: 사냥감에게 묻겠다 넌 네 주인님을 거역했을 때 어떻게 됐지?

translation.en: when last you displeased our keeper?
translation.ko: 넌 네 주인님을 거역했을 때 어떻게 됐지?

translation.en: Fair point, my subservient captors.
translation.ko: 네 말도 일리가 있구나 순종적인 포획자야

translation.en: [poacher bot 2] R'qazz will be most pleased to have you back in the fight pit.
translation.ko: 네가 싸움터에 돌아오면 르콰즈가 제일 기뻐할 거다

translation.en: [poacher bot 1] He may add your skull to his trophy belt after your loss.
translation.ko: 널 무찌른 후 네 두개골을 벨트에 달지도 모르지

translation.en: Oh, what an honor.
Let me at those circuit brains. No time for the bots.
translation.ko: - 회로를 머리에 단 놈들… - 밀렵 로봇은 잊어

translation.en: We gotta spring Cringer.
I knew you'd come for me.
We needed a faster ride home anyway. Stand back.
Hang on!
[poacher bot 1] Initiate stowaway protocol.
Great plan! Now what?
You up for a game of ram-ball?
I'm wearing my helmet, ain't I?
Adam of the Tiger Tribe risks it all...
...to send Krass to the net.
Will she make the...
[sighs] Have I mentioned how much I hate this game?
translation.ko: 내가 이 게임 정말 싫어한다고 얘기했던가?

translation.en: ...goal? [shouts, laughs]
Ow! Whoa!
[grunts] Ow.
Happy to see you too.
But hug me any tighter, and I'll let them keep you next time.
translation.ko: 더 세게 안으면 다음엔 안 구해줄 거야

translation.en: Wait. What happened to Krass?
Tiger Tribe for the win!
Cringer, next time you feel like
translation.ko: 크린저! 다음에 그 기계 불한당들과 붙을 거면 미리 좀 알려줘

translation.en: taking on some Beastopoids, let us know, huh?
translation.ko: 다음에 그 기계 불한당들과 붙을 거면 미리 좀 알려줘

translation.en: Now, where would the fun in that be?
Tiger Tribe forever?
[both] Tiger Tribe forever.
Why would you go hunting alone again?
translation.ko: 왜 또 혼자 사냥하러 간 거야?

translation.en: Everyone in the tribe does their part.
translation.ko: 부족의 모든 이는 자기 역할이 있어

translation.en: Even without my claws, I'd like to still do mine.
translation.ko: 발톱이 없어도 나도 내 역할을 하고 싶어

translation.en: Spoken like a true "Stripe."
I don't need a special tattoo to be a part of the tribe.
translation.ko: 나도 특별한 문신 따윈 없어도 범족의 일원이고

translation.en: You keep saying that, but I never see you leave.
translation.ko: 말은 그렇게 하면서 왜 안 떠나는 거야?

translation.en: Now, now, Krass'tine.
Every lost soul the tribe adopts gets their stripes when they so choose.
translation.ko: 부족에 입양된 일원도 나중엔 줄무늬가 생길 거야

translation.en: If Adam isn't ready to set aside his cuff and get his stripe,
translation.ko: 아담이 수갑을 벗고 줄무늬를 맞을 준비가 안 됐다면

translation.en: Adam isn't ready.
This is all I have from my life before.
translation.ko: 내 전 인생에서 남은 건 이게 전부야

translation.en: What if whoever lost me doesn't recognize me without this?
translation.ko: 날 잃은 사람이 이게 없어서 날 못 알아보면 어떡해?

translation.en: It's been ten years.
Ah, they probably stopped looking for you by now.
translation.ko: 이제 널 찾는 거 포기했을 거야

translation.en: Whatever, helmet head.
Kitty, what you doing?
There's a lady in the tree.
[Adam] Um, can we help you, tree lady?
Uh, your village is full of cats.
I'm apparently afraid of cats.
Then why did you come out here to where the Tiger Tribe lives?
translation.ko: 그럼 왜 범족이 사는 이곳으로 온 거야?

translation.en: [Teela] A voice in my head told me to.
Ask it how much it knows about cats being able to climb trees.
translation.ko: 호랑이가 나무를 얼마나 잘 오르는지 물어봐

translation.en: Why?
I got her!
Adam. Teela.
Magic!
-What if she got caught? -[Kronis] We'd know.
I've been listening to the Royal security channels.
translation.ko: 바로 알지 왕실 근위대 무전을 듣거든

translation.en: Right, because of all the crime we're doing.
This is about revenge on the king,
We're not not doing crime, though.
translation.ko: 그렇다고 범죄를 안 저지르는 건 아니잖아요

translation.en: You find her yet?
We're here. Descend.
[Duncan] Is that an actual poacher ship?
The sword doesn't want her found.
Think I can get these poacher bots up and running to hunt her scent.
translation.ko: 이 밀렵 로봇을 띄워서 냄새를 쫓도록 하면 돼

translation.en: Do it. Find the traitorous whelp.
Apprentice, get to work.
[Teela] Why aren't you afraid of magic like the rest of your people?
translation.ko: 넌 왜 다른 부족들처럼 마법을 겁 안 내?

translation.en: To be clear, the cats don't like magic.
Why let yourself get captured?
[sighs] You wouldn't understand.
Oh, because I'm from the jungle and you're from the city?
translation.ko: 넌 밀림에 살고 넌 도시에서 왔으니까?

translation.en: Believe me, you're from the city.
I am?
Yeah, your accent sounds like you were born into an upper family.
translation.ko: 맞아, 네 말투를 들으니 귀족 가문 출신 같은데

translation.en: Just count your lucky stars you're out here and not back in the house that Randor built.
translation.ko: 랜돌이 지은 집이 아니라 여기 있는 걸 다행으로 여겨

translation.en: You don't like the king?
No one likes the king,
especially at street level...
or below street level, which is where I usually am.
Randor won't do anything about all the poaching out here,
translation.ko: 랜돌은 여기서 일어나는 밀렵을 모른 척해

translation.en: so he's no friend of the tribe's either.
And now that we're done bonding,
shouldn't you be getting back to doing
translation.ko: 뭔진 모르지만 넌 네 머릿속 목소리가 시킨 일을

translation.en: whatever the voice in your head told you to?
translation.ko: 뭔진 모르지만 넌 네 머릿속 목소리가 시킨 일을 해야 하잖아

translation.en: Like I said... you wouldn't understand.
Try me.
That isn't jealousy I smell... [sniffs] ...is it?
Oh, of course not.
Adam's like a brother to me.
I'm just worried he's gonna leave.
Some flashy magic wielder showing up isn't gonna help anything.
translation.ko: 현란한 마법을 부리며 나타난 사람은 도움이 안 돼

translation.en: And it's a problem we can't solve by ramming it with your helmet, I assume.
translation.ko: 헬멧으로 부딪혀도 해결 못 할 문제인 것 같은데

translation.en: Every problem can be solved by ramming it with my helmet.
translation.ko: 내 헬멧으로 부딪혀서 해결 못 할 문제는 없어

translation.en: We may have a different problem for you to ram.
translation.ko: 이번 문제는 좀 다른 것 같은데

translation.en: [Teela] So the voice in my head led me here to deliver a package.
translation.ko: 그러니까 내 머릿속 목소리가 네게 물건을 배달하라고 했어

translation.en: To who?
You don't happen to have any champions out here, do you?
translation.ko: 혹시 여기에 투사가 있는지 넌 모르지?

translation.en: Being a champion
is about defending those who can't defend themselves.
translation.ko: 스스로 방어할 힘이 없는 이들을 보호하는 거야

translation.en: That was weird. Where did that come from?
translation.ko: 이상하네, 갑자기 왜 그 말을 해?

translation.en: [man] Are those poacher bots?
Give us the Witch.
Halt. Do not move.
Tiger Tribe answers to no one!
Technology!
I need to protect the village.
We'll find the girl and the sword once everyone's dead.
translation.ko: 모두 죽인 후에 그 계집과 검을 찾으면 돼

translation.en: Duncan, have the robots burn the village.
No, no, no, I--
I can't do that.
Coward.
I'll run out first.
Then you get this as far from here as quickly as you can. Hide it.
translation.ko: 그럼 이걸 최대한 여기서 멀리 가져가서 숨겨

translation.en: If I survive, my voice and I will come back for it.
translation.ko: 살아남으면 내 머릿속 목소리와 내가 찾으러 올게

translation.en: [man] We need water! Please--
[woman] Fire! We need to save the village!
Capture.
Ah, thank you, kind stranger.
[shrieks] Talking tiger!
Whoa! Flying child!
Krass, stand down. He saved me.
Hey, Evelyn.
There she is.
They don't get to attack us and run without a fight.
translation.ko: 우릴 공격해 놓고 안 싸우고 도망가면 안 되지

translation.en: Come on, Cringer.
[poacher bot] Intercept. Capture.
Contain.
Do not run.
Stop.
Error.
[grunts] Whoa!
Hang on. I've got you. [grunts]
Don't worry. This is my favorite cliff.
I almost die here all the time.
I told you to get away from here.
[Krass grunts] Get the real sword out of here.
I had a sword this whole time?
Hand it over, thief.
You want this?
Come and get it.
"By the Power of Grayskull,
I have the Power"?
I have the Power!
-What? -No!
What? He's... a man.
The Power of Grayskull.
Will never be yours!
The Power of Grayskull...
...belongs to me!
